notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected, potentially damaged structures in some affected colonies located in Venustiano Carranza, Cuauhtemoc, Benito Juarez, Coyoacan and Iztapalapa Municipalities, Federal District, Mexico. The analysis was performed by Faculty of Geography of the Autonomous University of the State of Mexico (UAEMex) using as post-event satellite imagery : WorldView-2 acquired as of 20 and 26 September 2017 and Pleiades acquired as of 22 September 2017. UAEMex identified 201 potentially damaged structures within the limit of the analyzed colonies, surrounded by a blue line in this map: 24 are located in Magdelena Mixhuca colony, 22 in Aculco, 21 in Atenor Sala and 20 in El Arenal. Please do not hesitate to send feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
